acceptedAnswer.text: TechXNinjas is a platform for tech enthusiasts that provides access to hackathons, tech challenges, community interaction, and professional growth opportunities in the world of technology.
You can join TechXNinjas by creating a free account on our website. This gives you access to events, courses, articles, and our community.

mainEntity.name: Are the courses on TechXNinjas free?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, most courses on TechXNinjas are free. We curate high-quality YouTube content from verified creators to help you learn at your own pace.

mainEntity.name: How can I participate in hackathons?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can browse upcoming hackathons on our Events page, register for the ones you're interested in, and follow the instructions provided for each event.
